name: GuitarChordoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, Guitar Chord of the Day!”
”Alexa, ask Guitar Chord of the Day for chord from yesterday”
”Alexa, ask Guitar Chord of the Day for chord from January 2nd”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guitar chord of the day
des:
Guitar Chord of the Day! will help you learn how to play guitar chords. Easy enough to use for beginners yet technical enough to challenge even the most seasoned player

Learn which notes make up each chord and where to place your fingers on the fret board. Before you know it, your catalog of guitar chords will grow significantly

Our database currently contains over 3000 variations of common guitar chords, so there's always something new to learn

Current Specs:

- Supports standard tuning on a six string guitar. More tunings and instruments will be available soon!
- All variations of chords start with the chord's root note. Support for chords with different bass notes to be implemented.
- Some chord variations may not be considered usual but we've worked hard and will continue to work hard providing you with the most common variations of guitar chords that can be found in major musical publications. For example, the F major chord you get here is the same one you'll find everywhere else.
